price: 95. Zij zeiden: “Bij Allah! Zeker, jij maakt een oude vergissing.”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
